text:
I have recently ordered the food from PK_SL Food Corner Sg and their food was super delicious,
Packing was good with high quantity.  we all loved the cutlet and chicken curry.
Wishing them a good luck.. Keep on going.
The most authentic and tasty Sri Lankan food you can get in Singapore. The food is very delicious, and I can recommend to all.
